name: Cave Toss
description:
A minimalist adventure platformer about a girl in a cave. Inspired by Celeste Classic and Celeste Classic 2. Written in a custom engine built from the ground up with Javascript by Alex Yang in 2 weeks.

Controls

GameplayArrow Keys, X, ZRestartRShow ScoreboardCFullscreenDouble ClickOptionsEnter
